title: Check and Get 3.4.0 + Serial -TrT
description:
Check and Get 3.4.0
__________________
Full version with Serial

* MultiLanguage
* Compatible with: Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7 (32/64 bit)

TrT Comment: Top of the notch bookmark manager.
Rating: [ 9/10 ]

Check&Get is a handy and powerful bookmark manager and web monitoring software
that allows you check your favorite Internet pages and detect if their content has changed or has become unavailable.
Check&Get can notify you of changes or web-server downtime by bookmark highlighting, 
by pop-up message, by playing a sound file or by sending you e-mail message with the updated web page.
Check&Get can even download the updated file from the Internet and save it to the specified folder on your hard disk.

Here are some key features of "Check&Get":
____________________________________

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· List Personal License Professional License
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Easy-to-use bookmark manager with the Explorer-like, intuitive drag-and-drop user interface
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· New customizable user interface that allows users to choose different "skins" making Check&Get 2.0 fun to use
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Ability to check web-pages for updates or changes, manually or automatically by individual schedule
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Secure Socket Layer support, ability to check secure https web-pages
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Simultaneous web-checking connections 10 10
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Extended bookmark and web-page searching capabilities, allows you to search your bookmarks 
  by common fields (name, description, keywords) and also make full-text searches of web-page content;
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Embedded browser pane for fast online / offline surfing
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Hit highlighting of changed content remains as an important feature allowing changed content in web pages to be 
  easily identified ? Users can see at a glance what new content has changed or been added to a web page;
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Users have the convenience of choosing multiple types of alert when content changes; You can select to have 
  an email sent with a copy of the changed web page including hit-highlighting, select to have a 'pop-up' alert 
  display on your screen or play a sound file ? either choice will ensure users are always aware 
   of changes to their favourite web pages
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· New auto saving feature provides 'Snapshots' of previous versions of web pages allowing users to compare 
  historical versions of a web page ? Not only can you now see what has changed but your can refer back 
   to the original version; up to 4 snapshots up to 30 snapshots
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Ability to open the bookmarks on any external browser (Internet Explorer, Netscape, Mozilla, Opera, MyIE2, Avant Browser, etc.)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Bookmark Import from the Internet Explorer, Opera, Netscape, Mozilla
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Bookmark Export to the Internet Explorer, Opera, Netscape, Mozilla
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Bookmark Synchronization with the Internet Explorer, Opera, Netscape, Mozilla
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Catch a URL or URL lists from the Windows Clipboard
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· The new extended URL import capability of Check&Get allows you to import links directly from a browser window, 
  HTML or text file or even from office documents (in fact from any file even if the file has the unknown or binary format);
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· "Duplicate URL Cleaner" Wizard - you can 'clean' duplicate URL's instantly, keeping your bookmark collection clean and efficient;
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Out-of-date bookmarks (dead-links) detection
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Support for permanent (LAN / DSL) or Dial-Up (VPN) Internet connections
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Auto-start, Run in the tray features
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Using within the company or organization



Install Notes:

1) Run cngsetup.exe
2) follow install steps
3) Enter Serial (top menu > Help > Enter Serial Number) 
     * Serial number inside archive, see serial.txt
     
Enjoy,
 TrT
